text: Diversion may refer to: * Traffic diversion *Diversion (play), a 1927 work by John Van Druten * Diversion (film), a 1980 British television film adapted into the 1987 movie Fatal Attraction * Diversion airport, an airport designated for an emergency landing * Diversion Books, an American publisher * Diversion dam, the rerouting of water * Diversion program, criminal justice scheme usually for minor offenses * Drug diversion, the transfer of legally prescribed controlled pharmaceuticals to other individuals * Product diversion, the sale of products in unintended markets * Yamaha Diversion, a motorcycle manufactured by Yamaha * Distraction * The Diversion (novel), a 2001 novel by K. A. Applegate Diversions may refer to: * Diversions for Piano Left Hand and Orchestra, work by Benjamin Britten ==See also== *Decoy *Red herring ru:Диверсия sl:Diverzija
title: Diversion
